Why North Dakota?


It is the only place we have ever known. There's something in the air, water,and soil that makes it the perfect place to create some fantastic bakes. Lucke Baker is a full bakery offering a variety of wonderful creations and other goods. Lucke Baker offers a large variety of products, and hope you'll try one on your next visit! We've continuously operated since 1977!

Due to being in the MidWest, the rigid seasons make and shape us. It enhances our core values. It is what make us, in our opinon such a lovely bakery.

We hope you come visit and share your favorite recipes with us!
